verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>joy<s%> in your <S%H5797>strength,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and in your <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> shall he <S%H1523>rejoice!<s%>
You have <S%H5414>given<s%> him his <S%H3820>heart's<s%> <S%H8378>desire,<s%> and have not <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H782>request<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
For you <S%H6923>prevent<s%> him with the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H2896>goodness:<s%> you <S%H7896>set<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H6337>pure<s%> <S%H6337>gold<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> of you, and you <S%H5414>gave<s%> it him, even <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
His <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation:<s%> <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> have you <S%H7737>laid<s%> on him.
For you have <S%H7896>made<s%> him most <S%H1293>blessed<s%> for <S%H5703>ever:<s%> you have made him <S%H8057>exceeding<s%> <S%H2302>glad<s%> with your <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>
For the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and through the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> of the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High<s%> he shall not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies:<s%> your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> out those that <S%H8130>hate<s%> you.

You shall <S%H7896>make<s%> them as a <S%H784>fiery<s%> <S%H8574>oven<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H6440>anger:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1104>swallow<s%> them up in his <S%H639>wrath,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them.
Their <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall you <S%H6>destroy<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and their <S%H2233>seed<s%> from among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
For they <S%H5186>intended<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you: they <S%H2803>imagined<s%> a <S%H4209>mischievous<s%> device, which they are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to perform.
Therefore shall you make them turn their <S%H7926>back,<s%> when you shall make <S%H3559>ready<s%> your arrows on your <S%H4340>strings<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of them.
Be you <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in your own <S%H5797>strength:<s%> so will we <S%H7891>sing<s%> and <S%H2167>praise<s%> your <S%H1369>power.<s%>
